clinical_study.brief_title: Doppler Ultrasonography Assessed Vascular Changes During Anesthesia Induction
clinical_study.official_title: Doppler Ultrasonography Assessed Vascular Changes During Anesthesia Induction

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators designed a study to assess whether there were any blood flow indexes change during anesthesia induction with doppler ultrasonography

detailed_description.textblock: The investigators designed a study to assess whether there were any blood flow indexes change during anesthesia induction with doppler ultrasonography.The indexes include Arterial Diameter,Peak Systolic Velocity,End Diastolic Velocity,Resistive Index,Pulsatility Index,Systolic/End Diastolic Ratio,Time AverageMean Velocity and Blood Flow.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Doppler Ultrasonography Assessed Vascular Changes during induction

primary_outcome.measure: The Change of Peak Systolic Velocity
primary_outcome.description: The Change of Peak Systolic Velocity during induction

arm_group.description: The investigators designed a study to assess whether there were any blood flow indexes change during induction with doppler ultrasonography ;general anesthesia combined with 0.5 μg/kg dexmedetomidine infusion before induction
The investigators designed a study to assess whether there were any blood flow indexes change during induction with doppler ultrasonography ;general anesthesia combined with paravertebral block
The investigators designed a study to assess whether there were any blood flow indexes change during induction with doppler ultrasonography ;general anesthesia combined with epidural block

intervention.description: The investigators designed a study to assess whether there were any blood flow indexes change during induction with doppler ultrasonography after 0.5% ropivacaine paravertebral block
The investigators designed a study to assess whether there were any blood flow indexes change during induction with doppler ultrasonography after 1% lidocaine epidural block

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Patients were included in the study if they were ethnic Chinese, between 18 and 65 years old American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status I or II,candidates for general anesthesia
Exclusion Criteria:
Patients were excluded if they do not want to cooperate with the test, had a history of upper extremity arteriosclerosis obliterans or thromboangitis obliterans, had a history of radial artery puncture or coronary artery bypass grafting,had acute vessel trauma,or had been diagnosed with Raynaud' disease, had suffered from mental or neurological disorder
